description: Autotest configuration file for reachability detection validation

reachability._comment_check_reachability_status: Verify that reachability analysis was performed
reachability._comment_expected_reachable_libraries: Expected REACHABLE libraries - NuGet packages and Python packages with reachable vulnerabilities
reachability._comment_expected_unreachable_libraries: Expected UNREACHABLE libraries - npm and JavaScript packages with unreachable vulnerabilities
reachability._comment_expected_total_reachable_count: Minimum number of reachable CVEs expected - 5 reachable vulnerabilities from aiohttp
reachability._comment_expected_total_unreachable_coun: Expected number of unreachable CVEs - 2 unreachable vulnerabilities from urllib3
